entities.name: harry

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is mentioned as a house-elf who left the Malfoys' to give Harry warnings.

entities.name: malfoys'
entities.description: The Malfoys are mentioned as Sirius's family and Dobby's former owners.

relationships.description: Dobby was a house-elf of the Malfoys'.
Sirius is tied to his family's house, implying he is a member of the Malfoys' family.
